description: Create and manage social posts with platform-specific variations that reflect your brand. Generate on-brand images and schedule or publish across your channels. Retrieve, update, and organize posts and brand styles to keep campaigns consistent.

apiKey.description: Your Thoth API key. Get it at https://app.usethoth.com/settings/api-keys

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the Thoth API (optional, defaults to https://www.usethoth.com)

capabilities.name: create-post
capabilities.description: Create a new content post with platform-specific variations. Enhances the content for each platform, optionally generates images, and can schedule or publish to social networks.

capabilities.name: get-post
capabilities.description: Retrieve a post by its ID. Returns the original content, platform-specific variations, generated images, and metadata.

capabilities.name: get-all-posts
capabilities.description: Retrieve all posts with pagination and optional filtering by status. Returns a list of posts with their metadata.

capabilities.name: update-post
capabilities.description: Update an existing post. Can modify title, content, platform-specific variations, and status.

capabilities.name: get-brand-styles
capabilities.description: Retrieve all brand styles for the authenticated user. Returns a list of brand styles with their basic information.

capabilities.name: get-brand-style
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific brand style by ID with full details including colors, tone, and imagery style.
